mapper.select: SELECT name as userName, phone as userPhone, attendance_date as attendanceDate, start_time as attnendanceStartTime, end_time as attnendanceEndTime, attendance.status as attendanceStatus, appliance.status as applianceStatus, appliance.time as applianceTime, user.course_id as userCourseId FROM user INNER JOIN attendance on user.id = attendance.user_id LEFT OUTER JOIN appliance on user.id = appliance.user_id AND attendance.id = appliance.attendance_id WHERE user.course_id = #{id} AND attendance_date = CURRENT_DATE

SELECT name as userName, phone as userPhone, attendance_date as attendanceDate, start_time as attnendanceStartTime, end_time as attnendanceEndTime, attendance.status as attendanceStatus, user.course_id as userCourseId FROM user INNER JOIN attendance on user.id = attendance.user_id WHERE user.course_id = #{id} AND attendance_date = CURRENT_DATE GROUP BY attendanceStatus

SELECT attendance_date as attendanceDate, attendance.status as attendanceStatus, COUNT(*) as count FROM user INNER JOIN attendance ON user.id = attendance.user_id LEFT OUTER JOIN appliance ON user.id = appliance.user_id AND attendance.id = appliance.attendance_id WHERE attendance_date BETWEEN CURDATE() - INTERVAL WEEKDAY(CURDATE()) DAY AND CURDATE() + INTERVAL (4 - WEEKDAY(CURDATE())) DAY GROUP BY attendanceDate, attendanceStatus HAVING attendanceStatus = 1;

SELECT attendance_date as attendanceDate, attendance.status as attendanceStatus, COUNT(*) as count FROM user INNER JOIN attendance ON user.id = attendance.user_id LEFT OUTER JOIN appliance ON user.id = appliance.user_id AND attendance.id = appliance.attendance_id WHERE attendance_date BETWEEN CURDATE() - INTERVAL WEEKDAY(CURDATE()) DAY AND CURDATE() + INTERVAL (4 - WEEKDAY(CURDATE())) DAY GROUP BY attendanceDate, attendanceStatus HAVING attendanceStatus = 2;
